name: CubeRoad!
description:
Do YOU like blocks? Do YOU like fun and satisfying physics? Then let me introduce you to CubeRoad! 

CubeRoad is a 3D platformer game about a cube, and platforms... But that is not all! I am working right now on different levels, obstacles and (multiplayer) gamemodes! If you want to try the game, you would do me a big favor. Thanks! BUT WHATEVER YOU DO, DON'T TOUCH THE SIDE OF THE LEVEL...

Disclaimer: This game is in version 0.2 so there can be glitches and bugs.  Right now I only have 12 levels but don't worry: Not all levels are easy peasy...

Controls: The only controls I have right now are just the A and D buttons that will let you go sideways. Later I will add a jump in different gamemodes and you will see why...

If you don't like a specific level or need help with something tell me in the comments and I can take care of that.

Keep the EXE file in the same folder otherwise the game won't work
